Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli

Class ModelInterpreterCLI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.ModelInterpreterCLI
All Implemented Interfaces:
ModelInterpreter
public class ModelInterpreterCLI extends Object implements ModelInterpreter
Class responsible for the application of the updates to the viewables sent by the model.

    • ModelInterpreterCLI

      public ModelInterpreterCLI​(ViewableFactory viewableFactory, ControllerInterpreter controllerInterpreter, OfflineInfo offlineInfo)
      Creates the model interpreter, and attaches to it the ViewableFactory and the ControllerInterpreter
      Parameters:
      viewableFactory - Place where the model interpreter can find all of the existing viewables, in order to be able to updated their values
      controllerInterpreter - Object responsible to manage to screen
